Summary: a flying object which appeared to look like a red/orange orb
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Corona
There were no other sightings in Corona on or around October 24th 2009
divs: sighting detailsi was at my friends house watching the ufc fight on october 24th, 2009 in corona, ca. after the fight was over, we all (at least 6 people witnessed this) decided to go out front of his house. being out there for a couple minutes conversating, my friends dad saw a light at a nearby mountain we call "skyline". at first, everyone assumed it was a car driving on the mountain on our side of the ridgeline. but soon after we all realized it was definitely not a vehicle. it looked like a red\orange fireball. a circular orb slowly moving around. then all of a sudden it zips quickly, god only knows how fast, into the air above the mountain and just sits there. everyone saw this and was in shock immediately. it started hovering horizontally across the sky. at this point i realized that the light was pulsating, and once in awhile flickered. after about 2 minutes, it brightened up then slowly faded away and disapeared instantly. i can definitely tell that by watching this redish light fade away, it was obviously traveling away from my point of view. after this, everyone wasnt sure if what we all saw was real, which clearly was since we all stood together watching this 'thing'. my friends dad then said, in quote, "this is just shocking, completely real, and trippy". this was my personal experience seeing a ufo. and i have been told times and times before by people that they have previously seen ufos in corona, ca. and after viewing the episode of "ufo hunters" and their visit to corona, i am sure of what i saw, and what we all saw. thank you for taking the time reading my story.
